By Jovial_Evil on Tuesday, August 23, 2005 - 02:43 pm:

lol, it is a Garu. I am learning a lot from making this one so far. In the future other Garus will be a lot better.
I am going to try to build an arena, or at least the back wall and stands that you see in the games when they battle in tournys to display the sculptures on.

By Iron_Datu on Friday, August 26, 2005 - 12:18 pm:

Ahhhhh! A killer Cabbage! Just kidding. Looks like its progressing well. What material is that? Are you going to paint it later? ^_^

By Jovial_Evil on Friday, August 26, 2005 - 03:32 pm:

thank you,
I am using Sclupey(an oven bake clay), can be found at most arts and crafts stores in a variety of colors. I am going to paint it later, but havent decided on what colors/breed yet.
